ARABIC: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have sent you with the truth bringing good news and giving warning. There is no community to which a warner has not come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn. Never has there been a community to which an admonisher was not sent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have sent you with the Truth to proclaim good news and to warn. Never has there been a nation but a warner came to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have sent you in all truth as a bearer of glad news and a warner. No nation who lived before was left without a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), We have indeed sent you with the Truth, giving glad tidings and heralding warnings; and there was a Herald of Warning in every group.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have sent you with the truth, a bearer of glad tidings and a warner. And there never was a nation but a warner had passed among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have sent you with the truth as a bearer of good news and a warner; and there is not a people but a warner has gone among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have sent thee with the truth good tidings to bear, and warning; not a nation there is, but there has passed away in it a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have sent thee with the Truth, a bearer of glad tidings and a warner; and there is not a nation but a warner hath passed among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent you with the truth as a bearer of good news and a warner, there is no community to which a warner has not come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have sent thee with the truth, as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner; and there is not a community but there hath passed among them a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have sent you with the truth as a bearer of good news and as a warner; and there is not a nation but a warner has passed in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We have sent thee in truth, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner: and there never was a people, without a warner having lived among them (in the past).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! We have sent you with the truth, a bearer of glad tidings, and a warner. And there never was a nation but a warner had passed among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have sent you with the truth, a bearer of glad tidings and warning, for there is no nation, that has not had a warner pass away in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent you with the truth; a bearer of good news, and a warner. There is no community but a warner has passed through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:24] Truly We have sent you with the truth, with [right] guidance, as a bearer of good tidings, to him who responds to it, and a warner, to him who does not respond to it. And there is not a community but there has passed, there has been, in it a warner, a prophet to warn it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We have sent thee) Muhammad (with the Truth) with the Qur'an, (a bearer of glad tidings) announcing Paradise for whoever believes in Allah (and a warner) from the Fire for whoever disbelieves in Allah; (and there is not a nation but a warner has passed among them) except that they had a warning messenger.
